verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I hear Thy welcome voice, That calls me, Lord, to Thee For cleansing in Thy precious blood That flowed on Calvary.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee! Wash me, cleanse me in the blood That flowed on Calvary!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' coming weak and vile, Thou dost my strength assure; Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse, Till spotless all and pure.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 'Tis Jesus calls me on To perfect faith and love, To perfect hope, and peace, and trust, For earth and heav'n above.
